name: Mingo Jump
description:
Mingo jump is a free casual game where your only goal is to achieve the biggest score.

The only mechanic is jump and you can make 3 jumps to go from one platform to another.

How more short is the time from one jump to other strongest is the jump that Mingo does.

If you have a time-out make a few runs and have fun

Music by https://itch.io/profile/xabi-goenaga
